name: 3 x 3 = 9 lives (A hungry cat simulator)
description:
A 3D first person (well..first cat)  simulation of waking up as a hungry cat.

A, D, W, S to move, mouse to look (if you forgive the pun).

Credits (free to use sounds and assets)

Free sounds freesound.org:
SophieMezaM - Meow
hamface - catscreech
Daxter 31 - snoring

Free Assets Unity Asset store:
GameREadyStudios - Old Rusted Bowl
PBR Polyart - Mouse Knight 
Sevastian Marevoy - Realistic Furniture Pack
